text: Following action by Senate Republicans to block reforms intended to keep guns out of the hands of terrorists -- including proposals to expand background checks and prohibit suspected terrorists from buying guns -- Hillary Clinton issued the following statement:"Enough."Stanley AlmodГіvar III, 23 | Amanda Alvear, 25 | Oscar A Aracena-Montero, 26 | Rodolfo Ayala-Ayala, 33 | Antonio Davon Brown, 29 | Darryl Roman Burt II, 29 | ГЃngel L. title: Hillary Clinton Statement on Senate Republicans' Refusal to Act on Gun Violence
